NOTIFICATION 
1.slantabad, the 281h March, 2013 
S.R.O. 277(1)/2013.—In pursuance of sub-section (2) of section 2 of the 
Central Law Officers Ordinance, 1970 (VU of 1970), the President of the Islamic 
Republic of Pakistan is pleased to direct that in the Additional Attorney-General, 
Deputy Attorney-General and Standing Counsel (Terms and Conditions) Rules, 2011, 
the following amendments shall be made and shall be deemed to have been so made 
from the 11th March, 2013, namely:— 
In the aforesaid Rules, in rule 2, for clauses (b) and (c), the following shall 
be substituted namely:— 
"(b) Deputy Attorney-General 
monthly retainer—one hundred fifty thousand rupees. 
chauffeur driven car of 1300 CC capacity with monthly one 
hundred fifty liters petrol or monthly ten thousand rupees.
